tuv.seg: Message resources for the Adito Active Directory feature
Adito当前路径特点的信息资源
Adito will integrate with your network's Active Directory server allowing users to use the same logon credentials as they would use for other Windows resources.
Adito 将会整合你网络的当前路径下的服务器，允许用户使用和Windows一样的登录密码
Roles will map to your Active Directory groups.
角色讲对应当前用户组
Host name of Active Directory controller
备份的管理员用户组名字
Host names of backup Active Directory controllers.
备份的当前目录的管理员用户名
Note: Host names may also include a port to overide the default controller port setting e.g. HostName[:Port]
备注: 用户名可能包含端口覆盖缺省的管理员端口设置，例如：用户名［：端口］
Your fully qualified Active Directory domain name.
你成功的定义了当前目录的域名
Adito requires a dedicated Active Directory account to retreive user and group details.
Adito要求一个有效的当前目录账户去审核用户和用户组的详细信息
If using the GSS-API authentication this should be set to the username of the service account e.g "adito".
如果使用GSS-API 授权，这需要设定服务的用户名账户，例如："adito".
If you are using LDAP Simple authentication you must enter a DN in the form "CN=Adito,OU=Accounts,DC=COMPANY,DC=NET"
如果使用LDAP 简单授权，你必须输入一个DN（域名）在 "CN=Adito,OU=Accounts,DC=COMPANY,DC=NET"的格式下
Adito requires a dedicated Active Directoryaccount to retreive user and group details.
Adito要求一个有效的当前目录账户去审核用户和用户组的详细信息
This field should be set to the password for this account.
这里应该为这个账户设置密码
Only include the following OUs when listing accounts and roles from the Active Directory (will still list standard users and groups unless options below are unset).
仅仅包括下面的OUs，当列出当前目录的账户和角色（将仍然列出标准用户和用户组除非选择不罗列
Exclude the following OUs when listing accounts and roles from the Active Directory.
排除一下的OUs当罗列当前目录的账户组和角色组时
Include the built-in group base 'CN=Builtin ....' built from the domain name.
包括创建用户组基于'CN=Builtin ....' 从域的名字中创建
If you do not include these you will have to manually add your own group base string to the the 'Additional group bases' list.
如果你不包含这些，你将需要手动的添加你自己的组基于字母串到‘额外的基础组’列表
See the documentation for more details.
Include distribution groups or should only security groups be displayed.
包含分发组或者仅仅显示安全组
包含标准的用户群和组群
Include the standard user base 'CN=Users ....' built from the domain name.
包含标准用户基于 'CN=Users ....' 从域名中创建
If you do not include these you will have to manually add your own user base string to the the 'Additional user bases' list.
如果你不包含这些，你将需要手动的添加你自己的组基于字母串到‘额外的用户基础组’列表
Authentication Type used for service account authentication.
授权形式用于服务账户的授权
If end-users have non-ascii usernames, Simple authentication must be used.
如果终端用户用不是ASC2码的用户名。简单授权将使用
Authentication Type used for user authentication.
授权形式用于用户的授权
Number of seconds before an authentication request to the Active Directory is considered timed out.
多少秒在一个授权请求到当前目录被认为是超时
Maximum number of retries to apply to each Domain Controller
验证最大重试将应用于每个域的控制器
Number of seconds before a connection to the Active Directory is considered timed out.
Number of seconds before a connection to the Active Directory is considered timed out.多少秒在连接到当先目录之前被视为超时
Should in-memory caching be used or file based.
应该使用缓存或者文件依据。
For larger user populations, a file based cache is recommended.
对于较大的用户群，建议使用文件依据缓存
The maximum number of users stored in the cache.
最大存储在缓存中的用户数量。
The maximum number of groups stored in the cache.
最大存储在缓存中的组的数量。
The amount of time (in minutes) that user and group information will be cached for.
用户和组将信息缓存的所需的时间（分钟）
Any changes to your active directory (new users, groups etc) will not appear in Adito until this time has elapsed.
任何更改，在你的当前目录中（新用户，组等）将不会出现在Adito直到这个时候已经过去了
Number of results to return in a single query to the Active Directory (multiple requests are made to receive all required objects).
返回在当前目录单一查询的结果数量（为了得到所有需要的对象，多个请求将会执行
A setting of 0 turns off paging.
If the memberOf attribute supported on the user account, the groups are inspected to find the user's group associations.
如果成员属性受用户帐户的支持，检查组找到用户的组协会
Note: Microsoft Small Business Server requires this to be unticked.
注意： Microsoft Small Business Server需要，这是unticked 。
Windows normally allows logon when the case of a username is incorrect.
在登录窗口，通常大小写不区分
Enable this option to force users to enter the correct case for their usernames
启用此选项，迫使用户在输入正确用户名区分大小写
Child domains require this value to be selected.
The Active Directory user cache is full.
There may be more accounts on the Active Directory which are not currently visible from Adito.
在当前目录下，可能有更多的账户，Adito是看不到的
It is recommended that the cache size is increased from it's current value: {0}.
推荐增加缓存的数量，在现在值的基础上: {0}.
The Active Directory group cache is full.
当前目录组缓存是满的
There may be more groups on the Active Directory which are not currently visible from Adito.
在当前目录下，可能有更多的组，Adito是看不到的
Message resources for the Agent server components.
信息资源的代理服务器组件
A pending VPN session ticket is required.
待审批的VPN会话票是被要求的
The agent failed to register within the allowed time period.
代理注册失败在允许的时间下
Agent shutdown failed because the agent was not active.
代理关闭失败因为代理是不活动
Message resources for the Adito Agent Client components.
信息资源的Adito代理客户端组件
错误出现在打开过程中{0}: {1}
Agent has {0} tunnel(s) open but no active connections.
Agent有 {0} 隧道打开没有激活连接
Agent has {0} tunnel(s) open with {1} active connection(s).
Agent 有 {0} 隧道打开包含{1} 激活连接
There are no open tunnels but {0} active connections remain.
目前没有开放的隧道但{0} 激活的连接存在
Setting user specified local proxy URL to {0}.
设置用户指定的本地代理网址到 {0}.
Adito Agent debug mode is not enabled, only serious errors will be displayed.
Adito代理调试模式没有启用，只有严重的错误才会显示出来
Expected hostname, port, username and ticket command line arguments
期望的主机名，端口，用户名和票的命令行参数
The server did not respond within the keep-alive time period.
该服务器没有响应在保活时间期限内
The server responded with an error.
Looking up registry value: scope={0} key={1} value={2}
查找注册值: 范围={0} 钥匙={1} 值={2}
Message resources for the AWT version of the Adito Agent Client components.
Adito代理客户端组件的AWT版本信息资源
在监视过程中出现异常.
Heartbeat thread exited, starting shutdown procedure.
Heartbeat 线程已退出, 开始关闭步骤
无法识别元素 {0} 在heartbeat回应中.
接受关闭指示在heartbeat过程中
Waiting for a client connection on port {0}
Failed to accept a client connection
Request contains some content of type {0}
请求包含某些类型的内容 {0}
读 {0} 表格数据的字节
Are you sure you wish to stop the selected tunnels?
你确定你想停止你选择的隧道？
Any applications that are using them may cease working correctly and you may lose work.
任何应用程序在使用这些隧道将正确的停止工作你可能失去你的工作
The HTTP server is redirecting the user agent
HTTP服务器重定向用户代理
Getting application descriptor using Maverick HTTP client
得到应用程序描述使用MaverickHTTP客户端
Downloading application file using Maverick HTTP client
下载应用程序描述使用MaverickHTTP客户端
Allow untrusted hosts is set to {0}.
允许不受信任的主机被设置为 {0}.
决定性的错误，正在关闭.
Attempting to detect proxy settings using platform specific methods
试图检测代理设置使用平台的对应的方法
Failed to get IE proxy settings, trying Firefox.
无法取得IE浏览器的代理设置，试图Firefox的
Failed to get Firefox proxy settings.
No useragent supplied, automatic proxy could not check for browse type.
没有用户代理提供了，自动代理不能检查浏览器类型。
利用插件提供的代理设置
Installing Maverick SSL support for HTTPSURLStreamHandler
Only local forwards can start a local listening socket.
只有本地推送可以启动一个本地侦听socket
Opened local tunnel "{0}" on port {1} to {2}.
打开本地隧道"{0}" 在端口 {1} to {2}.
Opened remote tunnel "{0}" on port {1} to {2}.
打开远程的隧道 "{0}" 在端口 {1} to {2}.
Closing local tunnel "{0}" on port {1} to {2}.
正在关闭本地隧道"{0}" 在端口 {1} to {2}.
Closing remote tunnel "{0}" on port {1} to {2}.
关闭远程隧道"{0}" 在端口 {1} to {2}.
正在检查是否 {0} 合适.
Failed to register local tunnel with the server.
向服务器注册本地隧道失败
Registered local tunnel with ID of {0}
Failed to register remote tunnel with the server.
向服务器注册远端隧道失败
Registered remote tunnel with ID of {0}
Request to open {0} via a temporary tunnel
打开请求 {0} 通过一个零时的隧道
You must select at least one tunnel to remove.
你必需选择删除至少一个隧道
删除用户名使用的隧道 {0}
Only administrators can remove global tunnels.
只有管理员才可以删除全局隧道
No tunnel with id of {0}, probably a temporary tunnel
没有用ID的隧道{0}, 可能是零时的隧道
You must select at least one tunnel to close.
你必需选择关闭至少一个隧道
You must select at least one tunnel to open.
你必需选择打开至少一个隧道.
No forwarding tunnel with id of {0}.
Message resources for the SWT version of the Adito Agent Client components.
对于Adito代理的SWT版本的组件的信息资源
The Adito Agent is an application that is required to provide tunneling, application launching and other features to the Adito server.
Adito代理是一个应用程序。 它需要被提供隧道，启动程序等功能向Adito服务器
No items match the provided filter.
没有项目的符合使用的过滤器。
No user will be able to access this resource.
没有用户可以使用这个资源
点击 ，退出向导 完成.
Please review any errors or warnings and either retry by clicking on Run Again, or click Exit Wizard to leave the wizard now.
请检阅任何错误或警告，并可以通过点击重试再次运行, 或者点击退出向导 现在退出向导
Please review the warnings and either retry by clicking on Run Again, or click Exit Wizard to leave the wizard now.
请检阅任何警告，并可以通过点击重试再次运行, 或者点击退出向导 现在退出向导
Failed to attach to resource to policies.
Here you can manage your currently installed extensions.
在这里你可以管理你当前加载的extensions.

Locate the archive using the Browse button and click on Upload to upload and install the application.

If you have made changes any application.xml files, you may use the Reload button to apply these changes without restarting Adito.

定为Archive用 浏览器 button and click on Upload to upload and install the application.

If you have made changes any application.xml files, you may use the Reload button to apply these changes without restarting Adito.
Files of type {0} may not be uploaded to this location.
文件的格式 {0} 可能不能在此处更新
Refuse all requests using invalid hostname.
拒绝所有请求，当使用无效主机的时候.
One or more fields contain errors, please review the fields below and try again.
一个或多个字段包含错误，请检查下面的字段，然后再试一次。
The default profile may not be deleted.
默认的配置文件可能不会被删除。
The default profile may not be edited.
默认的配置文件可能不会被编辑。
你不能命名自订的设定为‘默认’。
Message resources for Adito system configuration, profiles and profile properties.
Adito系统配置，配置文件和配置文件属性的信息资源
User or admin may use, view or change
用户或管理员可以使用，查看或更改
User may use or view, administrator may change
用户可以使用或查看，管理员可能会改变
User may use, administrator may view or change
用户可以使用，管理员可以查看或更改
Choose the profile you wish to use upon startup.
选择在启动时要使用的配置文件。
If Select At Login is chosen, you will be given the oppurtunity to select your profile upon login.
如果 选择登录选定后，您将被给予机会选择登录后您的个人资料
Here you can configure global Adito preferences that will become the default settings for each connecting user.
在这里您可以配置全球Adito偏好将成为默认设置每个连接用户
Note that users may have the ability to override some of these properties.
请注意，用户可以有能力覆盖其中的一些属性。
You can may create different profiles for different environments that your users may find themselves in (at home, at the office etc).
您可以创建不同的配置文件对于不同的环境中，您的用户可能会发现自己（在家里，办公室等） 。
If given the right to do so, a user may either simply use the profile or create new profiles based on them.
如果有权这样做，用户可以简单地使用配置文件或创建新的配置文件的在他们的基础上。
他们可能不能编辑它们
Here you can configure profiles that are used for storing various preferences for your users accounts.
在这里你可以配置 配置文件 这是用于为您的用户帐户存储不同的偏好。
为你的用户配置配置文件
Here you can configure profiles that may be used to store preferences for your individual user account.
在这里您可以设定配置档，可用于储存您的个人喜好，用户帐户。.
This is useful especially when connecting from different environments where your connection settings may be different (e.g. at home, at the office).
这是非常有用特别是当连接不同环境下的连接设置可能会有所不同（例如在家里，办公室） 。
The administrator will already have configured one default profile which you may view here but not edit.
管理员将已设置一个默认的配置文件，您可能可以浏览，但不能进行编辑。
This page allows you to view or change the preferences for your current selected profile.
此网页可让您查看或更改您的喜好，目前选定的配置文件
If you are currently using a default profile you will not be able to change anything, only the adminstrator may do this.
如果您目前使用的是默认的配置文件，你将不能改变任何东西，只有管理员可以做到这一点。
For easier navigation, all preferences are divided up into categories.
为了方便导航，所有偏好分为不同的类。
Drill down through the sections to find the required setting and click Apply to save.
浏览不同的部分，以找到所需的设置，并点击 应用 保存
To create a new profile, click on the button to the right.
创建新的配置，点击右边的按钮
This profile is attached to multiple policies :-
这个个人档案连接到多政策:-
The are no global profiles configured for you to use or manage.
没有全球配置的配置文件供您使用或管理。
You have no personal profiles configured.
您还没有设置个人资料配置。
Click on Create Personal Profile in the Actions bar if it is available to create one.
点击 创建个人档案 在行为条如果可以有效的创建一个
Edit this profile's name and description.
修改此配置文件的名称和说明。
设置此配置文件的属性
设置这个配置文件的属性
浏览这个配置文件的信息
This category of preferences contains sub-categories.
这一类的偏好包含子类别
Click on the category icon to display and edit these preferences.
点击分类图标来显示和编辑这些偏好。
Use this page to view and configure Attributes Definitions.
用这一页来浏览和设置属性定义.
These may be used any for replacement values anywhere that supports them (Application shortcuts for example may use one of these values).
这些可用于任何地方的重置取值，在支持这些取值的前提下（应用程序的快捷方式，例如可以使用其中的一个值） 。
There are currently no attribute definitions defined.
目前没有定义任何属性
Click on Create Attribute to create one.
点击 创建属性创建一个
Your filter did not match any sdsditems.
您的过滤器没有任何符合sdsd的项目
Click here if you wish to create a new User Attribute definition.
点击这里如果你想要创建属性用户属性 定义
The selected attribute definition will be removed.
选定的属性定义将被删除。
This page allows to you create a new attribute definition.
此网页可让您创建一个新的属性定义。
This page allows to you edit a attribute definition.
此网页可让您编辑一个属性定义。
User may use or view, admin.
用户可以使用或查看，管理员
User may use, admin can view or change
用户可以使用，管理员可以查看或更改
You must provide a name for the user attribute.
您必须提供一个名称为用户属性。
You must provide a description for the user attribute.
您必须提供描述为用户属性。
An attribute definition with the name {0} already exists
定义属性的名称 {0}已经存在
The name may only contain word characters ([a-zA-Z_0-9])
这个名字可能只包含文字字符 ([a-zA-Z_0-9])
The following wizard will guide you through the stages of create a new attribute definition and configuring it.
下面的向导将引导您完成各阶段的创建一个新的属性定义和配置它
步骤1 - 属性定义详情
Please choose the class of attribute and provide a name and description for this attribute definition.
请选择类别的属性，并提供一个名称和说明此属性的定义。
You may further configure this attribute definition using the optional fields below.
您可以进一步设定这个属性定义使用以下可选字段。
Review the information below before clicking on Finish to create the attribute.
检查以下信息，在点击前完成 创建属性
The attribute creation wizard is now complete.
属性创建向导现已完成。
The creation of the attribute has failed.
The creation of the attribute is complete, but some warnings occured.
已完成创建属性，但一些警告发生。
This page allows to you to edit your personal Attributes.
此网页可让您编辑个人的属性.
Attributes are pieces of information personal to you, and required by the various applications and features Adito provides you with.
属性是你的个人信息，被Adito为您提供各种应用和功能所要求。
Note, your administrator may require that you keep some of these details up-to-date yourself.
请注意，您的管理员可能要求您保持更新的你个人信息。
{0} requires a value but is empty.
{0} 需要的价值，但是是空的
Global profiles may not be deleted here.
全局配置文件可以在这里被删除
Global profiles may not be edited here.
全局配置文件可以在这里被编辑
All configuration data stored in the profile will be deleted.
储存在个人资料所有配置数据将被删除。
The configuration has changed and Adito now requires a restart before these settings can take effect.
配置已发生变化，现在Adito需要重新启动 在这些设置生效之前
The following wizard will guide you through the stages of configuring a new profile and assigning it to one or more policies.
下面的向导将引导您完成配置阶段的一个新的配置文件，并指派给一个或一个以上的政策。
Please provide a name and description for this profile and choose a profile to use as the basis for this new profile.
请为这个配置提供的名称和描述信息，并选择一个配置文件为使用的基础对于这个新的配置
No profile name has been provided.
You must provide a description for this profile.
你必须为这个配置提供描述
Profile name must be {0} characters or less.
配置名必须是 {0} 多个字母或者更少
Failed to check for resource by name.
配置已命名 {0} 已存在
Choose the policies you wish to attach this resource to.
选择你愿意连接这个资源的政策
You must select at least one policy to attach this resource to.
你必须至少选择一个政策连接这个资源选择你愿意连接这个资源的政策
Review the information below before clicking on Finish to create the profile.
检查以下信息，在点击前完成 创建配置
The profile creation wizard is now complete.
配置创建向导现已完成。
The creation of the profile failed.
The creaton of the profile is complete, but some warnings occured.
已完成创建配置，但一些警告发生。
在保持激活请求之间的时间间隔
Interval in seconds to wait for before exiting the client after receiving a shutdown request
在退出客户端之前等待数秒，收到关机请求之后
Start the Adito Agent automatically upon logon.
自动启动Adito代理根据登录
Command to launch browser, leave blank for automatic.
打开浏览器命令，自动加载空白页
Interval in seconds to wait before offering to close a web forward tunnel, a value of 0 meant no timeout.
时间间隔用秒计算，用以等待提供关闭传输网页隧道，值为0意味着没有超时。
For most operations, the agent will display information message popups information the user as to what actions the agent is performing.
对于大多数业务，代理将会显示弹除信息告诉用户代理执行了什么业务
Deselect this option if you do want these messages.
取消选择这个选项如果你需要这些消息
Enable this option to require that the user accept remote tunnel connections.
启用此选项，要求用户接受远程隧道连接。
If selected, an attempt will be made to automatically determine the proxy server in use from the browsers settings.
如果选择了，代理服务器将从浏览器中尝试使用，
Note, this will only work when using the Java2 plugin.
注意, 只有使用 Java2 plugin的时候才工作.
Hostname or IP address of proxy server.
主机名或IP地址的代理服务器。
Note, this address is as from the clients perspective.
请注意，此地址是从客户角度。
The port on which the proxy servier is listening.
代理服务器监听的端口
If the proxy server requires authentication, this value is supplied as the username.
如果代理服务器需要验证，此值提供的用户名。
If no username is entered here the user may be prompted for authentication when they connect.
如果用户没有在此输入用户名，提示进行身份验证时当连接的时候
If the proxy server requires authentication, this value is supplied as the password.
如果代理服务器需要验证，提供的做为密码。
If no password is entered here the user may be prompted for authentication when they connect.
如果用户没有在此输入密码，提示进行身份验证时当连接的时候
If your proxy uses Windows authentication you can set the authenticating domain here.
如果您的代理使用Windows身份验证您可以在这里设置身份验证域
If the proxy server supports different authentication methods - this setting allows you to choose which one will be attempted first.
如果代理服务器的支持不同的验证方法-此设置允许您选择哪一个将是第一次尝试
Interval in seconds to wait before offering to close an idle tunnel, a value of 0 means no timeout.
时间间隔用秒计算，用以等待提供关闭一个闲置隧道，值为0意味着没有超时。
当退出的时清除缓存目录
When enabled, the Agent will be removed from the clients computer upon shutdown.
当启用时，代理将被删除在客户关闭程序的时候
When disabled, the Agent's program files will be left inside a hidden directory, enabling a faster start up time on next use.
当关闭时，代理人的程序文件将被一个隐藏的目录内，从而使更快的启动时间在下次使用。
The name of the directory where the Agent will store downloaded applications and other resources.
代理下载应用程序和其他资源的目录名.
This directory will be stored in the users home (the actual location of which will vary from platform to platform).
这个目录会被存储在用户的主页（实际位置将因不相同的平台而不同）
The address to use when Adito needs to connect to the loopback address on the client.
当Adito需要在客户端连接环回地址的时使用的地址
For example, this may be set to 127.0.0.2 as a work-around for connection problems when using the RDP extension on Windows XP SP1.
例如，设置127.0.0.2作为工作环境的连接问题时，当使用RDP扩展在Windows XP SP1的时候
The type of Agent that will be downloaded on the client machine.
代理的类型将会下载到客户端
Auto will select the best appropriated Agent.
This option will enable tool tips in various places in the Adito user interface.
此选项将启用工具提示在不同地方的Adito用户界面。
The theme that will be selected upon login.
根据登录主题将会被选择
Enable or disable special window effects.
启用或禁用特殊的窗口作用。
默认的管理控制台资源视图
The default view type to use when listing resources in the management console
使用默认视图类型当在管理控制台罗列资源的时候
默认的用户控制台资源视图
The default view type to use when listing resources in the user console
使用默认视图类型当在用户控制台罗列资源的时候
Format used for entry of dates
Format used for entry of times
When enabled, users may choose the language for their session.
当启用时，用户可以为他们的使用段选择语言
Note, to be able to change their language during the session the user must also have the Change Language access right.
请注意，为了能够改变他们的语言在使用段期间，用户还必须有 改变语言 权限.
The default language for the server itself and all users sessions.
默认语言对于服务器自己和所有的用户的使用段
When enabled, context sensitive links to online resources will be displayed during on Adito pages.
当启用时，带链接的上下文将连接到在线资源并显示在Adito网页上
Updates for this help is retrieved daily from 3SP.
每天检索更新帮助从3SP.
User databases can contain a large number of users.
用户数据库可以包含大量的用户。
This property limits the number of users retrieved and displayed for the provided search criteria.
此属性限制用户检索的数量和显示所提供的搜索标准。
最大数量的用户组检索
User databases can contain a large number of groups.
用户数据库可以包含大量的用户组。
This property limits the number of groups retrieved and displayed for the provided search criteria.
此属性限制用户组检索的数量和显示所提供的搜索标准。
Select where information for authenticating users is obtained.
选择什么授权信息用户需要拥有
If you select 'Bullt-in', no further configuration is necessary.
如果你选择'Bullt-in', 不需要更多的设置
If you choose 'Active directory', you should ensure the Active directory options such as Domain are configured correctly.
如果您选择'当前目录' ，你应该确认当前目录选项，如域的配置正确无误。
Adito will use its own internal database of users and groups.
Adito将使用自己的内部的用户和组数据库。
If you use this User Database, you will also be able to create, edit and remove users and groups.
如果您使用此用户数据库，您也可以创建，修改和删除用户和组。
The maximum number of logon attempts before the logon is temporarily locked.
在暂时锁定前的最大尝试登录数
Use a value of zero to disable all account locking features.
使用0值禁用所有账户的锁定功能
When checking logon state, verify the remote address of the request against the address recorded at logon.
当在检查登录状态，核实远端需求地址与纪录的登录地址
This prevents re-use of logon cookies from other clients.
这可以防止其他用户重复使用的登录Cookie
The maximum number of temporary locks before the account is permanently disabled.
在永久禁用账户前的最大暂时锁定数
Use a value of zero to never lock accounts.
How long (in seconds) a temporary lock should last before the user can attempt authentication again.
多长时间（秒）一个暂时的锁定应该持续在用户得到暂时授权之前
A regular expression describing the requirements for a user password.
正规的表达式描述用户的密码的要求
The text that will be displayed to the user describing the requirements for a password.
显示给用户的描述密码要求的文档
The number of days after the last password change that a warning should be displayed telling the user they should change their password soon.
天数在上次更改密码之后，警告用户他们要尽快改变密码
If you do not want users to receive a warning you should set this value to zero.
如果您不希望用户能够收到警告您应该将此值设置为零。
The number of days after the last password change that the user will be forced to change the password.
天数在上次更改密码之后，强制用户他们改变密码
If you do not want the users to change their password you should set this value to zero.
如果您不希望用户改变密码，您应该将此值设置为零。
最大的登录 cookie 时间 (秒)
Maximum age of the cookie that is used persist the logon if the browser is closed.
最大的登录 cookie 时间 如果浏览器关闭了
A value of -1 will mean that the user will have to logon everytime the browser is opened.
值-1将意味着用户将不得不每次登录浏览器打开。
锁定使用段在浏览器关闭的时候
Enabling this option will force the user to provide their password upon opening a new browser and returning to the site.
启用此选项将迫使，当打开一个新的浏览器或者返回网站，用户提供他们的密码
This field can contain a list of users (or groups) that have administrative privileges by default.
这个字段可以包含一个默认管理权限的用户列表（或团体
Once you have an administrative account, you may use the Accounts page to assign administrative rights to other users.
一旦你有一个管理员帐户，您可以使用帐户页面的管理权限转让给其他用户。
You may also use regular expressions.
您也可以使用正规的表达式。
This option allows you to place restrictions on users logging on more than once.
此选项，您可以限制用户登录一次以上
When enabled, any answers to Personal Questions that the user may provide will be hidden using the * character in the same way as passwords are hidden.
当启用时，任何答案 个人问题 用户可能会将被隐藏，使用＊号和隐藏的密码相同方式。
This option determines how the passphrase for the user's private key is determined.
此选项决定用户私人密匙是怎么决定密码的
Attributes are stored by encrypting them with a user's public key so that they can only be decrypted by the corresponding private key.
属性是通过加密存储与用户的公用钥匙，使他们只能解密对应的私人钥匙。
When set to Automatic the passphrase for the private key will be automatically configured as the user's account password.
当设置自动的时候 私匙的密码将自动配置用户的帐户密码。
If no account password has been provided then it will be prompted for instead.
如果没有提供帐户密码，那么它会提示代替。
When set to Prompt the user will be prompted for the passphrase upon logon, meaning that the passphrase will be independent of the users password.
当设置 提示的时候 用户将被提示输入私匙密码在登录的时候，即私匙密码将是独立的账户密码。
Disabled will prevent the key being used at all, meaning confidential user attributes will not be available.
禁用 将会完全阻止使用私匙，即用户的保密属性将不可用
Restrict policies to signed on authentication scheme.
用以认证计划的限制政策
This option restricts the available resources to those which are attached to the policies assigned to the authentication scheme used at login.
这个选项限制了在登入时使用这个限制政策认证的可用资源
Allow WebDAV access from clients that do not support cookies.
允许客户接入不支持cookies的WebDAV
This would include Nautilus in Gnome, Finder in OS X and other WebDAV clients.
这包含 Nautilus在Gnome系统, Finder苹果系统和其他的WebDAV 客户端.
Behaviour is much the same, except it is not possible to mount unauthenticated Network Places (i.e. those that would normally pop up a secondary authentication dialog).
对于行为也是相同的，除了使用没被授权的网络（比如那些会跳出第2级授权对话框）
It may also have an affect on performance as authentication is performed on every request.
这可能对表现也有影响，因为没个要求都包含授权
Public key algorithm used to encrypt confidential user attributes.
公开密钥算法用来加密机密的用户属性。
Bit length of public/private keys used to encrypt confidential user attributes.
位长的公共/私人密钥用来加密机密的用户属性。
You can disable Adito's native SSL server and listen for plain HTTP connections instead of HTTPS.
您可以禁用Adito本地SSL服务器，并听取普通HTTP连接而不是HTTPS的
This is useful for some types of SSL accelerator cards.
这是非常有用的某些类型的SSL加速器卡
The password to use for the main SSL certificate.
主要SSL证书密码的使用密码
Port on which the webserver will listen for HTTPS requests.
Web服务器侦听HTTPS请求的端口
The mimimum number of threads to reserver for the web server.
保持Web服务器的最小线程数
The maximum number of threads to reserver for the web server.
保持Web服务器的最大线程数
The number of minutes of inactivity before a session will automatically invalidated and the user logged out.
在一个会话自动无效和用户取消登录前的会话不活动时间
The IP address of the interface to listen for connection on.
监听连接的接口的IP地址
Leave blank to listen on all interfaces.
If a value if provided here, the hostname that the client uses to access Adito must match one of those below.
如果这里提供了一个值，那么这个值必须是用于连接Adito的下面的一个
If it does not, the browser will be redirected to the first hostname in the list.
如果不是，浏览器将会重新导航到在列表中的第一个主机
Sets the action to take if a client tries to connect using an invalid hostname.
设置执行的行为，如果一个客户使用一个无效主机连接
The port number on which to listen for HTTP requests.
Users cannot access the main SSL VPN over HTTP, this service is available to extensions to add HTTP services and to redirect users to the HTTPS server.
用户不能使用主要的SSL VPN基于HTTP, 这项服务是可用的当在extensions 中添加tHTTP服务和重新导航用户到HTTPS 服务器。
Set the maximum thread idle time (minutes).
设置最长闲置时间线程(分钟)
Threads that are idle for longer than this period may be stopped.
线程闲置长与这个时间将停止
Delegated to the named or anonymous Pool.
下放给记名或不记名投票.
Set the low resource persistence time (seconds).
设置低资源持续时间（秒）
When the server is low on resources, this timeout is used for idle persistent connections.
当服务器资源不足时，这个超时将用于管理持续闲置连接。
It is desirable to have this set to a short period of time so that idle persistent connections do not consume resources on a busy server.
为闲置的持续连接设置一小段时间是可取的，因为这样不消耗服务器资源
Set the size of the buffers used by connections from this listener.
设置用于监听这个连接的缓存的大小
The header reserve area within the buffers used by connections from this listener.
缓冲中标题储备区将会用于这个监听的连接
The header reserve is space reserved in the first buffer of a response to allow a HTTP header to be written in the same packet.
标题储备是在第一个缓存中的空间储备用于允许 HTTP标题写进同一个包
The reserve should be large enough to avoid moving data to fit the header, but not too large as to waste memory.
储备要足够大用于装入标题所需的数据，但也不要过大而浪费内存
The number of requests that should be processed before Java garbage collection is scheduled.
在Java的垃圾收集计划前，要处理请求的数量
Set to 0 (zero) to let the virtual machine handle this automatically.
设置0 (0)让虚拟机自动处理
When enabled, generates a CSV log (logs/stats.csv) containing web server statistics.
当启用时，生成的CSV日志（日志/ stats.csv ） ，其中载有Web服务器的统计数据。
The server must be restarted for this option to take affect.
服务器必须重新启动这项操作才能生效
How often the statistics log file is updated in seconds.
多少秒统计日志文件要更新
When enabled all data returned to the client browser will be compressed.
启用后的所有数据返回到客户端浏览器将被压缩。
This saves bandwidth at the expense of some processor time.
这样可以节省带宽以处理器时间代价。
Enable the request log and every request will be logged in the file [adito-installation]/logs/[yyyy-mm-dd].request.log.
启用请求日志，每个请求将会写入文件[adito-installation]/logs/[yyyy-mm-dd].request.log.
This file is in NCSA format.
Disables the untrusted SSL certificate warning
禁用不可信的证书警告
Turn on TCP/IP No Delay option to force all data to be flushed to network and not buffered.
打开TCP/IP没延时选项，强制所有的数据进入网络不加缓存
If your network configuration requires use of a proxy server outgoing HTTP / HTTPS connections, provide the hostname or IP address here.
如果你的网络设置要求使用代理服务器发送 HTTP / HTTPS 连接,在这里提供一个主机名或者IP地址.
If your network configuration requires use of a proxy server outgoing HTTP / HTTPS connections, provide the port number on which the proxy server is running here.
如果你的网络设置要求使用代理服务器发送 HTTP / HTTPS 连接,在这里提供代理服务器运行的端口号
If you have configured Adito to use an HTTP proxy server that requires authentication, provide the user here.
如果你设置Adito使用HTTP代理服务器，这需要授权，在这里提供用户
If you have configured Adito to use an HTTP proxy server that requires authentication, provide the password here.
如果你设置Adito使用HTTP代理服务器，这需要授权，在这里提供密码
If you have configured Adito to use an HTTP proxy server, there may be a need to specify hosts that are not proxied.
如果你设置Adito使用HTTP代理服务器，这需要授权，这可能需要确定不用代理的主机
Enter one host or IP address per line, with no termination character.
在每一行输入一个主机或者IP地址，不要结束符
If your network configuration requires use of a SOCKS proxy, provide the hostname here.
如果你的网络设置要求使用代理服务器发送 SOCKS连接,在这里提供一个主机名或者IP地址.
If your network configuration requires use of a SOCKS proxy, provide the port here.
如果你的网络设置要求使用代理服务器发送 SOCKS连接,在这里提供端口号.
If you SOCKS server requires authentication, provide the user here.
如果SOCKS服务器需要授权，在这里提供用户
If you SOCKS server requires authentication, provide the password here.
如果SOCKS服务器需要授权，在这里提供密码
With this option enabled, Adito will automatically attempt to connect to 3SP Extension Store when the Extension Manager page is loaded.
如果这个选项启用了，Adito将自动尝试连接3SP Extension商店，当读取Extension管理页的时候.
This authentication module requests a username and password using a web based form.
这验证模块要求用户名和密码使用的是基于网络的形式。
The submitted details are then passed to the currently active User Database for verification.
提交的资料，将传递到目前活跃 用户数局库核查
This authentication module asks the user for the answer to a random personal question (e.g. Your favorite color).
这验证模块要求用户给出个人随机问题的答案（例如，您最喜欢的颜色） 。
This authentication module requests a username and password using the HTTP BASIC mechanism.
这验证模块要求用户名和密码使用 HTTP BASIC 机制。
The browser will be sent an Un-authorized response code, which will cause an authentication dialog to be shown.
浏览器将发送不授权 响应代码，这将造成一个验证对话框显示。
Note, some browser may have the ability to cache these details - Adito is not in control of this.
请注意，一些浏览器可能有能力缓存这些细节- Adito是无法控制了这一点。
The user details supplied will be verified by the currently active User Database.
用户提供的详细资料将被验证使用当前活动 用户数据库.
The submitted details are then passed to the configured RADIUS server for verification.
提交的资料，将传递到设置 RADIUS 服务器用以核实
This system authentication module allows users to logon via WebDAV using username and password only.
该系统认证模块，用户可以只通过登录的WebDAV使用的用户名和密码。
It must be the only module in a scheme.
它必须是唯一的模块的计划。
This system authentication module allows users to logon via the embedded client using username and password only.
该系统认证模块允许用户登录的嵌入式客户端只通过使用用户名和密码。
Start the SMTP delivery system when Adito starts
开始的SMTP服务系统当Adito启动时
The host name or IP address of the SMTP mail server.
主机名称或SMTP邮件服务器的IP地址。
The port number on which the SMTP service is running.
正在运行的SMTP服务的端口号
The email address to use as the sender.
电子邮件地址用于发送者地址
The hostname to provide when logging in with HELO.
提供主机名当登录 HELO的时候.
Leave blank to use the default hostname.
不填，使用默认的主机名
A short name for this Adito installation.
If this is not blank, it will appear just after the Title
如果填写了，它将显示在 标题
You can configure a custom title for the logon page.
你可以设置标题在登录页
Leave this blank to use the default internationalised Adito title.
不填，将使用默认的国际化的Adito标题.
You can configure a custom logo for the logon page by copying an image file to [adito]/conf/site/icons and then choosing it here.
你可以设置一个个性话的标志在登录页使用拷贝一个图片文档到 [adito]/conf/site/icons然后在这里选择
Here you may provide any message you wish displayed to all users when they logon.
在这里，您可以提供您想要的任何信息显示给所有用户登录时
You may not use not HTML here.
你可能不用不 HTML这里.
If set to anything other than No Message, a message will be displayed to all users when they logon.
如果你设置不是空消息, 信息将显示给所有在用户登录时
This setting determines the icon that will be displayed next to the message.
此设置确定的图标将显示消息旁边。
Set's the alignment of the message text, options available are justify and center.
设置消息对齐，自动和中心对齐选项可用
The list of SSL protocols supported by Adito
The list of SSL ciphers supported by Adito.

If the selected cipher list is empty then all available ciphers are supported, if you edit this list then ensure that SSL_RSA_WITH_RC4_128_MD5 is selected as this is required by the Adito Agent.

WARNING: Editing these properties may cause compatibility problems with some older browsers.

如果已选的加密的列表是空，那么所有可用的加密将被支持，如果编辑了列表，请确保SSL_RSA_WITH_RC4_128_MD5被选中，因为这是Adito代理要求的.

警告：编辑这些属性可能导致旧的浏览器兼容性问题
This option enforces strict security requirements on outgoing SSL connections.
此选项对上行的SSL连线。强制执行严格的安全要求
All outgoing SSL connections should have a trusted SSL certificate, either trusted by the default Java CA trust store or by the Adito trust store.
所有上行的SSL连线应该有一个信任的SSL证书，被默认的Java信托商店或Adito信托商店信任
If a server presents an untrusted certificate the connection will be terminated.
如果服务器提供了一个不受信任的证书连接将被终止。
Use this link to access options to configure various security options used by Adito.
使用此链接访问选项来配置各种Adito使用的安全选项
Here you can configure options that relate to how Adito treats confidential user attributes.
在这里您可以配置选项涉及如何对待机密Adito用户属性
HTTP and Socks 代理服务器
Configure how the logon page looks
设置你的登录页面外观
All of the settings in this category affect the behaviour of the Adito Agent.
所有设置在这个类别中影响Adito代理的行为。
Settings included timeouts and proxy servers.
设置包括超时和代理服务器。
Session settings affect how your Adito login session looks and behaves.
会话设置影响您Adito登录会话的外观和行为。
Here you may configure things such as your session timeout and home page.
在这里，您可以配置，例如您的会话超时和主页
Use this link to configure options such as web server settings, network proxy settings and automatic update settings.
使用此链接配置选项，如Web服务器设置，网络代理设置和自动更新设置
You can also set security settings here such as password lengths, maximum connection attempts and timeouts.
您还可以设置安全设置，如密码长度，最大连接尝试和超时。
The resources section allows you control over settings concerning Network Places, Profiles and Web forwarding settings.
资源区段可让您控制设置有关，网上邻居，概况和网络转发设置。
Here you can configure many properties relating to how Adito integrates with your Microsoft Windows file shares and other Windows resources.
在这里您可以配置许多性能有关如何Adito结合您的Microsoft Windows文件共享和其他Windows的资源。
Options are available that can assist with troubleshooting sharing problems on Windows.
此选项可用于帮助分担问题与故障排除的Windows 。
Adito can use a number of different methods to communicate messages to administrative and normal users.
Adito可以提供许多不同的方法，用以管理员和普通用户之间沟通信息
Here you can configure settings relating to these message delivery methods.
在这里您可以配置设置有关这些消息传递方法
Options for the Secure Sockets Layer.
下载 {0}K of extension {1}, 请等待
